comment_text:
I'm working on some stuff and since I wanted to save the podcast for when I could give it more attention I thought I'd briefly check out the comments.

My eyes jumped to the "TODO" and laughing out loud I thought that was the funniest thing I've read on Hacker News; then I noticed your #define ;)
author: thevibesman
story_title: Is the Universe a Giant Computer Simulation? Here's the Evidence
